solution_line_template: Helen lives {helen_fraction} * {mabel_steps_east} = <<{helen_fraction}*{mabel_steps_east}={helen_steps_west}>>{helen_steps_west} steps directly west of Lake High.
To reach Helen, Mabel would have to walk to {mabel_steps_east} + {helen_steps_west} = <<{mabel_steps_east}+{helen_steps_west}={total_steps}>>{total_steps} steps.
